name: Summer Games 3D Lite
description:
The Summer Games in 20 events !
-Athletics,
-Cycling,
-Rowing,
-Swimming.

Features:
-100m Athletics,
-400m Athletics,
-4x100m Athletics,
-1500m Athletics,
-110m Hurdles Athletics,
-Javelin Athletics,
-Hammer Athletics,
-HighJump Athletics,
-LongJump Athletics,
-PoleVault Athletics,
-Keirin Cycling,
-Sprint Cycling,
-Pursuit Cycling,
-Sprint Team Cycling,
-500m Rowing,
-1000m Rowing,
-50m Swimming,
-100m Swimming,
-200m Swimming,
-4x100m Swimming,
-1 player or 2 players "split screen" mode,
-3 control mode for each event.

Only "100m", "400m" & "Javelin" are available in Lite version.

iPhone, iPod Touch & iPad compatible.

Enjoy !
